fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, visit another player to give them Anterograde Amnesia. In the following day, they will be notified that their Read Message History permission for this day has been revoked, and they won't get it back, even after it ends.
- At night, visit another player, and learn of their history. You will learn their alignment and subalignment. You will be able to win with them alive.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- It is difficult for you to hold on to new memories. Thus, in public and private chats, you do not have the Read Message History permission. Your Player Channel and the Dead Chat are the only exceptions.
- You cannot use the same ability two nights in a row, unless your previous attempt was unsuccessful for any reason.
- You have Basic Defense that only works against people who you have investigated in previous nights.
- Your investigation ability cannot be deceived or redirected.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to ensure that only players whose histories you know are alive. It doesn't matter if those players can win together or not.
